mapper.select: /*getMainPopupList*/ SELECT AAA.BANNER_POPUP_UUID as uuid ,AAA.BANNER_POPUP_GUBUN as bannerPopupGubun ,AAA.BANNER_POPUP_WIDTH as bannerPopupWidth ,AAA.BANNER_POPUP_HEIGHT as bannerPopupHeight ,AAA.BANNER_POPUP_TOP as bannerPopupTop ,AAA.BANNER_POPUP_LEFT as bannerPopupLeft ,AAA.BANNER_POPUP_START_DT as bannerPopupStartDt ,AAA.BANNER_POPUP_END_DT as bannerPopupEndDt ,AAA.BANNER_POPUP_LINK as bannerPopupLink ,AAA.BANNER_POPUP_TITLE as bannerPopupTitle ,AAA.BANNER_POPUP_TARGET as bannerPopupTarget ,AAA.USE_AT as useAt ,BBB.BANNER_POPUP_FILE_MASK as fileMask ,BBB.BANNER_POPUP_FILE_NAME as fileName ,BBB.BANNER_POPUP_FILE_PATH as filePath ,BBB.BANNER_POPUP_FILE_EXTENTION as fileExt ,BBB.BANNER_POPUP_UUID as file_uuid FROM REHMAUC.BANNER_POPUP AAA LEFT JOIN ( SELECT BBB.BANNER_POPUP_UUID ,MAX(BBB.REGIST_DT) as maxRegistDt FROM REHMAUC.BANNER_POPUP_FILE BBB GROUP BY BBB.BANNER_POPUP_UUID ) Subquery ON AAA.BANNER_POPUP_UUID = Subquery.BANNER_POPUP_UUID LEFT JOIN REHMAUC.BANNER_POPUP_FILE BBB ON Subquery.BANNER_POPUP_UUID = BBB.BANNER_POPUP_UUID AND Subquery.maxRegistDt = BBB.REGIST_DT WHERE AAA.ACTIVE = 'Y' AND AAA.USE_AT = 0 AND NOW() BETWEEN AAA.BANNER_POPUP_START_DT AND AAA.BANNER_POPUP_END_DT ORDER BY AAA.BANNER_POPUP_START_DT

/*getPopupListCnt*/ SELECT COUNT(*) FROM REHMAUC.BANNER_POPUP WHERE ACTIVE = 'Y'
AND BANNER_POPUP_TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchInput}, '%')

/*getBannerPopupOpenOne*/ SELECT AAA.BANNER_POPUP_UUID as uuid ,AAA.BANNER_POPUP_GUBUN as bannerPopupGubun ,AAA.BANNER_POPUP_LINK as bannerPopupLink ,AAA.BANNER_POPUP_TITLE as bannerPopupTitle ,AAA.BANNER_POPUP_TARGET as bannerPopupTarget ,AAA.USE_AT as useAt ,BBB.BANNER_POPUP_FILE_MASK as fileMask ,BBB.BANNER_POPUP_FILE_NAME as fileName ,BBB.BANNER_POPUP_FILE_PATH as filePath ,BBB.BANNER_POPUP_FILE_EXTENTION as fileExt ,BBB.BANNER_POPUP_UUID as file_uuid FROM REHMAUC.BANNER_POPUP AAA JOIN ( SELECT * FROM REHMAUC.BANNER_POPUP_FILE WHERE BANNER_POPUP_UUID = #{popId} ORDER BY REGIST_DT DESC LIMIT 1 ) BBB ON AAA.BANNER_POPUP_UUID = BBB.BANNER_POPUP_UUID WHERE AAA.ACTIVE = 'Y' AND AAA.BANNER_POPUP_UUID = #{popId}

/*getBannerPopupOne*/ SELECT BANNER_POPUP_UUID as uuid ,BANNER_POPUP_GROUP as bannerPopupGroup ,BANNER_POPUP_GUBUN as bannerPopupGubun ,BANNER_POPUP_WIDTH as bannerPopupWidth ,BANNER_POPUP_HEIGHT as bannerPopupHeight ,BANNER_POPUP_TOP as bannerPopupTop ,BANNER_POPUP_LEFT as bannerPopupLeft ,BANNER_POPUP_LINK as bannerPopupLink ,BANNER_POPUP_START_DT as bannerPopupStartDt ,BANNER_POPUP_END_DT as bannerPopupEndDt ,DATE_FORMAT(BANNER_POPUP_START_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') as startDay ,HOUR (BANNER_POPUP_START_DT) as startTime ,DATE_FORMAT(BANNER_POPUP_END_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') as endDay ,HOUR (BANNER_POPUP_END_DT) as endTime ,BANNER_POPUP_TARGET as bannerPopupTarget ,BANNER_POPUP_TITLE as bannerPopupTitle ,USE_AT as useAt FROM REHMAUC.BANNER_POPUP WHERE BANNER_POPUP_UUID = #{uuid}
/*getBannerPopupFile*/ SELECT * FROM REHMAUC.BANNER_POPUP_FILE WHERE BANNER_POPUP_UUID = #{uuid} ORDER BY REGIST_DT DESC LIMIT 1
